title: How should I study for the last month for the Neet preparation? If I am getting a score in between 500-550 in my test? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well,in the last month all u need to do if ur getting good marks or not is , Stop reading new things n build up on wat u have read till now….make those things completely strong..in such a way dat u should b able to convert the time u have spent these days into ur marks…it should b in conscious mind…u should get to ur mind wateve u have read immidiately only then can u answer questions faster during the exam… And never panic if ur not remembering some things ..read again….ull have forgotten many things ..but don't worry….revise themagain n I'm sure ull never forget anything dat u read now under such pressure…. Have positive vibes n work…ull do it.. N don't b on cloudnine thinking u got good marks in coaching tests….the final paper will b different…way different frm wat u write usually….keep revising n don't relax completely until u finish the exam… Hope it helps…   Subscribe my http://channel….to b motivated..

Calm down, you still have a lot of time left with us…i guess 40–50 days. Learn physics formula and practice questions, preferably start from past year questionsFor Physical chemistry - learn formula and for organic chemistry learn reaction,understand mechanisms and practice questionsBiology and inorganic - read read read…try to memorize.Try to complete your syllabus within next 20–25 days so that remaining time could be given for strengthening weak topics and for practice.Hope it helps Thank you :)
